'''No Turning Back''' is a [[soundtrack]] from the album ''[[Islands of the Lost and Forgotten]]''.

It is a remix of ''[[Beats of Water Drops]]'' with the additional arrangements done by Yijun Jiang ({{zh|姜以君}}) of [[HOYO-MiX]].
